title: A Wonderful Stay - Renaissance of the Heritages
content:
I am pleased to share my comments and personal feelings here about the wonderful stay at Renaissance Xi'an Hotel last month. As a frequent traveler with 100+ nights spent in hotels annually, I would like to say that this is an OUTSTANDING hotel with many details which are praiseworthy. 

Among all the Renaissance hotels I've stayed in globally, I think this one is the best. The stylish decor and the sense of heritage make a perfect mixture of tradition and modernity. I have to say that in a city located in the Northwestern hinterland of China, it's not easy to find chilling, refreshing and avant-garde elements even in the hotels with international brands. But this hotels makes both its appearances and qualities perfect. 

Both the hotel management team and the staff are dedicated to work and service. Warmhearted as they are, the team members perfectly make their SOPs a good demonstration of sincere hospitality. Especially, the Executive Lounge team led by Fanny performed their high-level dedication and conscientiousness, which perfectly met the guests' expectations to the service of an upper-scale hotel. All associates are professional with good passion.

More improvements are expected when it comes to the catering services: both the quality and food choices of the breakfast buffet should be better. The attendants at the Chinese restaurant (6/F) are expected to show more readiness to service to the guests, even there's not much business during lunch time.

The executive lounge is modern with good catering and nice staffs. Donâ€™t miss the happy hour! I like Asahi Beer so much.

title: Excellent facilities and exceptional staff
content:
I booked two rooms for my parents.  We had a great experience here.  The rooms are spacious and beds are comfy.  The lounge has many selections of foods and drinks. The swimming pool is very large.  I have decided to move in for my two week stay in Xiâ€™an.  Special thanks go to Jessie (front desk), Mira and her friend (lounge), Emily (manager) and many other staff for their super service!
